text: Aleksandr Vladimirovich Melnik (; 11 June 1958 â€“ 8 September 2021) was a Russian movie director. His best known works were Terra Nova (2008) and Territory (2015). Melnik died after slipping and falling at the Kitabo-Oron waterfall near Norilsk, Russia on 8 September 2021 at the age of 63. Head of the Ministry of Emergency Situations Yevgeny Zinichev tried to rescue Melnik, however Zinichev also fell to his death. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian movie producers Category:Russian screenwriters
title: Aleksandr Melnik
